item.description:
We got the room at the library! This first meeting will be to get to know each other and our Qigong backgrounds and interests. We can also talk about dues, special events, meeting format, topics and days for future meetings, and if time, cultivate some Qi! Please bring your ideas for future topics - example, history of Qigong, different types of Qigong, Jing, Qi, Shen (essence, energy and spirit), how Qigong is related to acupuncture and Chinese medicine, etc. I expect the meeting will last 1 to 1-1/2 hours. Feel free to email me if you have any questions. I hope to see as many of you as possible.

Thanks,
Dee
item.how_to_find_us: The Lucia Mastrangelo Meeting Room is on the 2nd floor. Go up the stairs, turn right and right again, going through the reading room to the glass-walled meeting room. The room name is on the wall to the left of the door.
item.name: Greater Boston Qigong September Meetup - Getting to Know Us
